brief.content-text: The diagram depicts the function of a server in the client-server model. Client icons include a user at a PC with video data and one with music data connected to a server icon via a network cloud. The server has A V I and WAVE file icons next to it. The server provides these files to the end user clients so that they can receive video and music. The server has the labels "Processes Software" and "Disk Drives Hardware". The caption text states "Servers are repositories of information. Processes control the delivery of files to clients."
